titleInfo.title: Allied Jewish Israel Teen Tour Group

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Representatives of various synagogues/ temples Allied sponsored 1974 Israel Teen [illegible] shown with tour leaders and tour guide Mr. and Mrs. Paul Zuckerman, Rabbi and Mrs. Harold Kranzler, and Avi Brown.''

mods.abstract: A group of seven teens, representatives of various synagogues and temples, with their group leaders and tour guide for a 1974 Israel teen tour Mr. and Mrs. Paul Zuckerman, Rabbi and Mrs. Harold Kranzler, and Avi Brown.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
